Casual  Strategy/Puzzle Game
Only needs a mouse.
A mix betweeen bowling and pinball 
----

Lore:
The family of the protagonist lost their home and their food, the protagonist agonized for months, when he was about to die he was visted by a Demon that offers him a opportunity for  revenge.  He got the power to spawn power creates and the ability to summon a giant ball that weights 600kg.
